of this stuff. So that is a super thing.
But package early, package often.
Waiting till the last minute to package
is just as bad as waiting to optimize at
the last minute. And this is something I
find a lot of people kind of push off to
the end. They're like, "Well, we didn't
get a build server up yet. We didn't
want to do it yet." But I can't stress
this enough. Just hit the button. Like
the more you hit the button, the faster
it goes. It's kind of seems silly to me.
Uh but it's smart. the system knows what
has and hasn't been packaged already and
so it's not going to do it all over
